content: Construct a table in CSV format listing five classical music composers, their country of origin, period of activity, and two of their most famous works.

Sure, here's a CSV formatted table with the information you requested:

"Composer","Country of Origin","Period of Activity","Famous Work 1","Famous Work 2"

"Johann Sebastian Bach","Germany","1685-1750","Brandenburg Concertos","Mass in B minor"

"Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart","Austria","1756-1791","Symphony No. 40","The Marriage of Figaro"

"Ludwig van Beethoven","Germany","1770-1827","Ninth Symphony","Moonlight Sonata"

"Frédéric Chopin","Poland","1810-1849","Nocturnes","Piano Concerto No. 1"

"Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky","Russia","1840-1893","Swan Lake","1812 Overture"

You can copy this into a CSV file or a spreadsheet program to view it neatly.
